name: Ideamill
description: They make things with words and pictures, pens and paper, cameras and lenses, moving and still, light and dark, online and off. But it all starts with an idea. Every. Single. Time. And that's where they come in. They are IdeaMill. A group of highly curious people who help clients bring communication ideas to life. They are currently working on a new web face to display a few of our idea collaborations.
